tool_description: All Pancakeswap API ( Feel Free To Ask For More Endpoints )
name: Pancakeswap API Freemium
title: Pancakeswap API Freemium

api_list.name: Get NFT Collections
api_list.description: An Endpoint to get NFT Collections on Pancakeswap
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pancakeswap-api-freemium.p.rapidapi.com/api/nft/collections"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pancakeswap-api-freemium.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
